statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM customer_profiles WHERE credit_score >= 600;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' AND credit_score > 700 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT name, age, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT name, gender, credit_score FROM customer_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE credit_score < 600 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 102;
SELECT customer_name, join_date FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProductPreferences WHERE preference_score > 4.5;
SELECT product_name, preference_score FROM ProductPreferences WHERE customer_id = 103;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, preference_score FROM ProductPreferences ORDER BY preference_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles INNER JOIN ProductPreferences ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = ProductPreferences.customer_id WHERE ProductPreferences.preference_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM CustomerProfiles LEFT JOIN ProductPreferences ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = ProductPreferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(preference_id) AS preference_count FROM ProductPreferences GROUP BY customer_id HAVING preference_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT full_name, age, email FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT product_name, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations;
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM preferences;
SELECT full_name, age, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT full_name, age, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY full_name ASC
SELECT * FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC
SELECT cp.full_name, p.preference_type, p.preference_value FROM customer_profiles cp JOIN preferences p ON cp.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.preference_type = 'category'
SELECT cp.full_name, pr.product_name FROM customer_profiles cp JOIN product_recommendations pr ON cp.customer_id = pr.customer_id WHERE pr.product_name LIKE '%shoes%'
SELECT MAX(age) AS oldest_age FROM customer_profiles
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, income FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' AND income > 50000
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 1000 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT customer_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC, created_at ASC
SELECT id, name, age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM ProductRecommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS preference_count FROM Preferences GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM AIAlgorithms WHERE algorithm_name LIKE '%recommendation%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM FinancialProducts WHERE category = 'Investment'
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT name, age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, preference_category, preference_value FROM Preferences WHERE preference_category='food';
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM AIAlgorithms ORDER BY algorithm_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM FinancialProducts WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY price ASC;
